org.transitime.modules

Class Module

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.transitime.modules.Module
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AvlJmsClient, AvlModule, BatchGtfsRealtimeModule, PlaybackModule

    public abstract class Module
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Modules are run in a separate thread and continuously process data. They are initiated by core by configuring which modules should be started. Each module should inherit from this class and implement run() and a constructor that takes the projectId as a string parameter.
    Author:
    SkiBu Smith

      Starts up the thread that runs the module

      Runs the named module in a separate thread.

        Runs the named module in a separate thread. This is the main interface to this class.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        true if successful. Otherwise false.
